ticket.title: TCK alias observation window, reconciliation gates, and snapshot-emitter sunset

tickets.reason: Projection-only runtime truth must already be in place.
Event parity guarantees are needed for reliable alias/work_id reconciliation.

in_scope: Implement ticket_alias observation window controls as non-authoritative overlays.
Implement reconciliation checks between ticket_alias projections and canonical work_id projections.
Gate promotion on zero unresolved alias/work_id mismatches.
Sunset snapshot emitters after exit criteria while preserving historical trace fields.
out_of_scope: Reintroducing ticket YAML as runtime authority.

steps: Define reconciliation projection and mismatch defect schema.
Add observation-window gate checks using ledger windows and HTF ticks.
Add migration task to disable/remove snapshot emitters once exit criteria pass.
Add regression tests for alias drift/mismatch detection and fail-closed promotion behavior.
Run cargo fmt --all && cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings && cargo test --workspace.

criteria: ticket_alias is operator-facing only and never authority-bearing.
Promotion gates require zero unresolved alias/work_id mismatches.
Snapshot emitters are removed/sunset after criteria pass with historical trace preserved.

notes.security: Alias fields are for cognition/traceability only; authority remains work_id on ledger/CAS.
notes.verification: Include explicit mismatch-injection tests and promotion gate assertions.
